definition: An agreement between two parties. For example a contract or a memorandum of understanding
A submission by a party in response to a decision or action taken by NICS
A submission by a party requesting a service from NICS
An object with inherent value that is or will be regsisted with NICS
A request for the views of NICS
The process of identifying an asset and registering it with NICS. E.g. Listing a building or scheduling a monument.
A request for information held by NICS
Corrective steps taken to ensure compliance with an an agreement or account
A monetary award that citizens or groups may apply for under the relevant scheme/service.  A grant may also be known as a payment or an award.
A process of gathering data to make an informed decision
A geographic description of a physcial area.  It often also includes a description of how the area is being used.
An individual citizen or an organisation
A description of a law or statuatory requirement
